description: Righteous was initially inspired by the all capitals letterforms from the deco posters of Hungarian artist Robert Ber√©ny for Modiano. Grid based and geometric in execution, the letterforms are highly readable at a range of point sizes. Unlike that of the inspiration source, Righteous has a full lowercase to increase flexibility of use.
